scripts.start: npx @11ty/eleventy --serve & npx tailwindcss -i ./src/assets/css/input.css -c ./tailwind.config.js -o _site/assets/output.css --watch & npm run watch:sass
scripts.build: npx @11ty/eleventy && npx tailwindcss -i ./src/assets/css/input.css -c ./tailwind.config.js -o _site/assets/output.css --minify && npm run build:sass
